Richard "Younglord" Frierson (amụrụ na Julaị 9, 1978) bụ ónyé America na-emepụta hip hop na R&B nke a họpụtara na Grammy.
N'afọ 2014, Frierson guzobere The Truth Licensing
Onye isi na-enye egwu màkà ihe nkírí, ihe ngosi TV, na mgbasa ozi azụmahịa.

Ónyé ọbọdọ New York City, a bịanyere aka na Nọvemba 1994, mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na isii, na Puff Daddy's Hitmen Production Team  na-emepụta maka ndepụta nke akara ahụ gụnyere Mase, The Lox, Faith Evans na 112
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ mepụtara màkà ihe ndị ọzọ dị ka Virtue, DMX, Lloyd Banks, Veronica, New Edition na Consequence
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ihe ịga nke ọma ya bụ na Diddy comeback single "Come to Me", nke ruru Number 9 na The U.S
Billboard Hot 100 Singles Sales nke Yakubu "Jai" Izuagbe nke a makwaara dị ka Rebel mepụtara.
Frierson bụkwa ónyé na-ahụ maka nzukọ onye na-emepụta ihe ugbu a bụ Ryan Leslie na P
Diddy mgbe e nyere Leslie nkwekọrịta ụbọchị 30 dị ka ónyé na-arụ ọrụ na-emepụta egwu màkà Frierson
Mgbè ndị mmepụta abụọ ahụ mepụtara egwu Beyoncé Knowles "Keep Giving Your Love To Me" màkà ụda egwu Bad Boys 2, a gwara Ryan ka ọ zute P
N'afọ 2014, Frierson guzobere The Truth Music Licensing
Eziokwu ahụ na-achịkwa akwụkwọ ndekọ nkè ihe karịrị abụ 5,000 ma nye ikikere egwu na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkírí, netwọk, na ụdị dị elu.
Ikike Ikike Rock bụ rebranding nke The Truth Music Library
Mgbanwe a nwèrè nnukwu mmụba na mmekọrịta ya na akara egwu dị elu
Mgbanwe ndị a mere ka LTR nọrọ n'ọnọdụ iji wuo nnukwu katalọgụ ma ghọọ ike kachasị na oghere ikikere
Ụfọdụ n'ime ntinye License To Rock bụ na Mona Scott's "Love & Hip Hop" franchises, Lee Daniels' "STAR" & "EMPIRE" na mgbasa ozi maka ụdị gụnyere Gatorade, Pepsi, na AT&T.
